description:
Spaceship Trinkets

d100 --> Trinket

01â€“02 --> Disembodied robot arm with a mind of its own
03â€“04 --> Wearable blanket with sleeves and a hood
05â€“06 --> Small, rectangular device that can record and play back audio of up to 1 minute in length
07â€“08 --> Glow-in-the-dark ink pen
09â€“10 --> Fashionable jumpsuit
11â€“12 --> Compact scanner that reports whether an object is recyclable in a cheery tone
13â€“14 --> Wristwatch programmed to beep at a specific time
15â€“16 --> Handheld cylinder that produces a 15-foot cone of bright light for up to 1 hour every 24 hours
17â€“18 --> Colorful toy ray gun with lights and sounds
19â€“20 --> Bottle of fizzy, sweet-tasting liquid
21â€“22 --> Map of an unexplored star system
23â€“24 --> Motorized toothbrush that might have been used
25â€“26 --> Tiny robot that shines boots and shoes
27â€“28 --> Pressurized red canister with a flexible hose that, when squeezed as an action, sprays a 15-foot cone of foam. The foam extinguishes all nonmagical flames in the cone. The canister can perform this action only once.
29â€“30 --> Loaf of space bread covered in blue-green mold
31â€“32 --> Handheld screen that plays a children's story about a friendly, three-eyed frog named Swampy
33â€“34 --> Compact device that displays the current weather
35â€“36 --> Empty metal bottle that maintains the temperature of liquids stored in it for 1d4 hours
37â€“38 --> Tiny disc that emits a high-pitched noise in the presence of smoke or mild cooking fumes
39â€“40 --> Aerosolized can of metal polish
41â€“42 --> Identification badge of a deceased crew member
43â€“44 --> Depleted energy cell
45â€“46 --> Pocket-sized instrument that clicks rapidly within 10 feet of radiation
47â€“48 --> Vacuum-sealed package of shriveled frankfurters
49â€“50 --> Tin hat that telepathically broadcasts the wearer's surface thoughts to creatures within 10 feet of it
51â€“52 --> Chalky moon rock
53â€“54 --> Collar that, when placed on a Medium or smaller Beast, translates its cries into Common
55â€“56 --> Bottle of expired medicine for treating dizziness
57â€“58 --> Tiny speaker that plays a catchy tune in an unknown language
59â€“60 --> Handheld tool for removing bolts and screws
61â€“62 --> Cautionary pamphlet about the dangers of space
63â€“64 --> Miniature flying saucer
65â€“66 --> Tiny, animatronic bunny that hops after the creature that activates it
67â€“68 --> Stick of deodorant with a surprising scent
69â€“70 --> Countertop appliance that can transform any fruit into a pulpy juice
71â€“72 --> Glass pendant filled with stardust
73â€“74 --> Pot containing an artificially dwarfed tree
75â€“76 --> Otherworldly insect preserved in amber
77â€“78 --> Syringe filled with a viscous, yellow serum
79â€“80 --> Tiny brass orrery
81â€“82 --> Log of passenger names
83â€“84 --> Gas mask with a hole in it
85â€“86 --> Small glass terrarium with an empty cocoon
87â€“88 --> Dongle that never plugs in correctly on the first try
89â€“90 --> Holster fashioned from an unknown reptile's hide
91â€“92 --> Severed bundle of important-looking wires
93â€“94 --> Prosthetic limb with magnetic attachments
95â€“96 --> Set of polyhedral dice that buzz and flash when they land on their highest result
97â€“98 --> Musical instrument that plays electronic tones
99â€“00 --> Trading card of a beloved fictional hero from a far-off world
name: Spaceship Trinket
